article.title: Welcome to the San Francisco U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the San Francisco U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized companies develop international markets.

Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you

  • identify and evaluate international partners
  • navigate international documentation challenges
  • create market entry strategies
  • other export related guidance

The U.S. Export Assistance Center is part of an international network of global professionals. We have 165 offices in 82 countries throughout the world. For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please learn more about Our Services.

Meet our Business Service Providers!

The San FranciscoBusiness Service Provider directoryprovides an additional resource to San Francisco based U.S. exporters.

Business Service Provider Tip of the Month –Export Tax Incentive


US companies that export goods (products or raw materials) may benefit significantly from an IC-DISC. For more information, you may wish to contact our listed Business Service Provider,Crowe Horwath LLP. Please also see ourBusiness Service Provider Programfor more information. Please note, listing in our BSP directory does not constitute a US Department of Commerce endorsement—please exercise appropriate due diligence before contracting the services of any business service provider.
